thread.title: The minor league team receiving Tim Tebow called their shot 8 months ago
thread.title_full: The minor league team receiving Tim Tebow called their shot 8 months ago - SBNation.com

author: sbnation.com
title: The minor league team receiving Tim Tebow called their shot 8 months ago
text:
The Columbia Fireflies had a simple dream in August.
So I heard @TimTebow is considering baseball... pic.twitter.com/L1lJYyPveq
— Columbia Fireflies (@ColaFireflies) August 9, 2016 The Fireflies photoshopped Tim Tebow in their jersey back in August of 2016. The Mets ’ Class-A affiliate surely didn’t think this was possible, but decided to have a little fun. Then on September 6, almost a month after their tweet, Tebow signed with the Mets.
Fast-forward seven months and ...
Tim Tebow will be assigned to the @ColaFireflies , the Mets' low Class-A affiliate, Sandy Alderson tells @MarcCarig : https://t.co/AsG1Cg1Ese pic.twitter.com/7ohTpNEFk8
— Newsday Sports (@NewsdaySports) March 20, 2017 It’s happening! Tebow is being assigned to Columbia, whose opening game is on April 6. Naturally they’re more than a little excited about it.
pic.twitter.com/XfeRNEO3Pa
— Columbia Fireflies (@ColaFireflies) March 20, 2017 Now we just wait as a Tim Tebow jersey inevitably hurtles to breaking sales records for the Fireflies.
